item.title: Contact
item.description: Email: K1NAD@K1NAD.NET Other emails: K1NAD@K1NAD.COM & K1NAD@ARRL.NET

item.title: VHF/UHF
item.description: For VHF/UHF/D-STAR I have the Icom ID-5100A Deluxe. It is a 2m/70cm/D-STAR radio which also can be used for public service monitoring. For an antenna I use a Diamond X-50NA Dualband antenna. It is mounted on my chimney and is about 6ft tall with a 10ft mast.

item.title: HF
item.description: For a radio I use 1 of 2 radios. W1HIV gifted me an Icom IC-735 with a PS-55 power supply, the issue with this radio is that 20m does not work by not work I mean does not receive or transmit. The other radio KB1IWE loaned to me and that is a Yaesu FT-840 which works great! For an antenna I have a Cobra Ultralite Senior (140ft long) and it is 100ft up.

item.title: About K1NAD
item.description: I am a Ham Radio operator and operate under the call sign K1NAD. I am studying for my Amateur Extra class license and currently hold a General class license. I enjoy computer programming, website design, and much more. 73 de K1NAD
